explanation: [0-0] A little girl with a black ponytail is holding a can of soda by the stairs. She is wearing a white undershirt and a red and blue dress with pink slippers. The stairs are gray with black handrails and glass railings. The floor is off-white, and the walls are white. The room is furnished.

[0-3] Then the little girl falls to the ground, spilling the soda on the floor. At this point, the scene changes to a boy wearing a red vest and blue pants. He is wearing a brown straw hat and clenching his fists. Yellow flame effects are added to his face and legs, indicating anger. Behind him is a drawn gray curtain. The little girl widens her eyes in fear when she sees this.

[10-17] Afterward, the scene switches again. Several metal structures stand against a blue background. A rocket is launched from the central metal rack, emitting white smoke below. At this point, the scene switches to the little girl squatting on the surface of the gray-blue moon. Behind her are the blue Earth and the deep blue starry universe. Suddenly, a broom is thrown in front of her. She looks up to see the boy in the brown straw hat standing opposite her with his hands on his hips, pointing at her with his left hand and speaking. Colorful meteors streak across the night sky behind them.
